channel.title: CVE Feed for Japan Computer Emergency Response Team Coordination Center (JPCERT/CC) -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Japan Computer Emergency Response Team Coordination Center (JPCERT/CC) -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-38751|2024-08-02T17:54:38.324Z -- japan%20computer%20emergency%20response%20team%20coordination%20center%20%28jpcert%2Fcc%29 -- special%20interest%20group%20network%20for%20analysis%20and%20liaison
item.description: Improper authorization vulnerability in Special Interest Group Network for Analysis and Liaison versions 4.4.0 to 4.7.7 allows the authorized API users to view the organization information of the information receiver that is set as "non-disclosure" in the information provision operation.

item.title: CVE-2023-38752|2024-08-02T17:54:38.527Z -- japan%20computer%20emergency%20response%20team%20coordination%20center%20%28jpcert%2Fcc%29 -- special%20interest%20group%20network%20for%20analysis%20and%20liaison
item.description: Improper authorization vulnerability in Special Interest Group Network for Analysis and Liaison versions 4.4.0 to 4.7.7 allows the authorized API users to view the attribute information of the poster that is set as"non-disclosure" in the system settings.
